Hydras:

ou to insolate the resheach area,"

ess


  
> "it seems that nighshift tried to capture he matrix"said Hydras"=
I guess caus he wants to make amends of his tendency to appear and disappea=
r"

Cyclonus nodded thoughtfully as he watched the screen before him.
"Ever=
ything seems in order." He said carefully as he tapped a finger
on his chin=
.

Activating his minion transmitter he spoke into it, "Return to radio
sil=
ence, and give me a full report at the next interval."

In front of Cyclonu=
s the screen flickered once and then went blank,
leaving only the distant r=
adar signatures that the Black Fortress was
reading up.

Activating his tra=
nsmitter Cyclonus spoke again, "Continue operation
'overwatch' until furthe=
r notice."

Two other voice respond quietly from the transmitter, "Acknowle=
dged. Out"

Cyclonus turned to Hydras, "I would be most interested in meeti=
ng this
Nightshift."

Scourge, who had been up to this time standing nearby=
 and off to the
side, standing nearly silently nodded. "He shouldn't have w=
ent by
himself for such an important prize." He grumbled slightly.

*******=
******

Meanwhile . . .

> "Better but not fully recovered" she said soflty=
 "Are we under attack?"
>
> she said that with concern while she set a hand=
 in one of Rodimu's.

"Us?" Rodimus said as his optics glanced up at the do=
or to be sure
that it was locked and secured. it was. "No. I believe some b=
ody got
themselves into some kind of trouble out there. They haven't told m=
e
too much yet."

He looked down at Nightlight again as he covered her hand=
 reassuringly
with his own, "The important thing is that you are safe. Unti=
l you get
your beast mode re installed you are vulnerable. We need to pick =
one
for you."

(TAG)

Preston
